resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

eventId.name: eventId
eventId.description: UUID or numeric ID of the event
eventId.ai_hint: UUID or numeric ID of the event

type.name: type
type.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: invited_by
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: org_id
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

attributeId.name: attributeId
attributeId.description: ID of the attribute to update
attributeId.ai_hint: ID of the attribute to update

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

useJson.name: useJson
useJson.description: Whether to use JSON to specify the fields for the search request

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: invited_by
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: org_id
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

org_id.name: org_id
org_id.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
org_id.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

information.name: information
information.description: Information on the event - max 65535 characters
information.ai_hint: Information on the event - max 65535 characters

tagId.name: tagId
tagId.description: ID of the tag to update
tagId.ai_hint: ID of the tag to update

url.name: url
url.ai_hint: 必须包含协议头 (http:// 或 https://)。支持表达式注入。

feedId.name: feedId
feedId.description: ID of the feed to update
feedId.ai_hint: ID of the feed to update

galaxyId.name: galaxyId
galaxyId.description: UUID or numeric ID of the galaxy
galaxyId.ai_hint: UUID or numeric ID of the galaxy

organisationId.name: organisationId
organisationId.description: ID of the organisation to update
organisationId.ai_hint: ID of the organisation to update

role_id.name: role_id
role_id.description: Role IDs are available in the MISP dashboard at /roles/index
role_id.ai_hint: Role IDs are available in the MISP dashboard at /roles/index

userId.name: userId
userId.description: ID of the user to update
userId.ai_hint: ID of the user to update

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'attribute' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'attribute' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'eventId'
IF resource == 'attribute' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'type'
IF resource == 'attribute' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'value'
IF resource == 'attribute' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'attribute' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'attributeId'
IF resource == 'attribute' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'attributeId'
IF resource == 'attribute' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'attribute' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'attribute' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'useJson'
IF useJson == True AND resource == 'attribute' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonOutput'
IF useJson == False AND resource == 'attribute' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'value'
IF useJson == False AND resource == 'attribute' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF /resource == 'attribute' THEN HIDE parameter 'searchall'
IF resource == 'attribute' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'attributeId'
IF resource == 'attribute' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'event' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'org_id'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'information'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'eventId'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'eventId'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'publish' THEN SHOW parameter 'eventId'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'unpublish' THEN SHOW parameter 'eventId'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'useJson'
IF useJson == True AND resource == 'event' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonOutput'
IF useJson == False AND resource == 'event' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'value'
IF useJson == False AND resource == 'event' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'eventId'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'eventTag' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'eventTag' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'eventId'
IF resource == 'eventTag' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'tagId'
IF resource == 'eventTag' AND operation == 'remove' THEN SHOW parameter 'eventId'
IF resource == 'eventTag' AND operation == 'remove' THEN SHOW parameter 'tagId'
IF resource == 'feed' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'feed' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'feed' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'provider'
IF resource == 'feed' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'url'
IF resource == 'feed' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'feed' AND operation == 'disable' THEN SHOW parameter 'feedId'
IF resource == 'feed' AND operation == 'enable' THEN SHOW parameter 'feedId'
IF resource == 'feed' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'feedId'
IF resource == 'feed' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'feed' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'feed' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'feedId'
IF resource == 'feed' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'galaxy' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'galaxy' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'galaxyId'
IF resource == 'galaxy' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'galaxyId'
IF resource == 'galaxy' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'galaxy' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'noticelist' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'noticelist' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'noticelistId'
IF resource == 'noticelist' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'noticelist' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'object' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'object' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'useJson'
IF useJson == True AND resource == 'object' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonOutput'
IF useJson == False AND resource == 'object' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'value'
IF useJson == False AND resource == 'object' AND operation == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'organisation' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'organisation' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'organisation' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'organisation' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'organisationId'
IF resource == 'organisation' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'organisationId'
IF resource == 'organisation' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'organisation' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'organisation' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'organisationId'
IF resource == 'organisation' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'tag' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'tag' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'tag' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'tag' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'tagId'
IF resource == 'tag' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'tag' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'tag' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'tagId'
IF resource == 'tag' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'role_id'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'warninglist' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'warninglist' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'warninglistId'
IF resource == 'warninglist' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'warninglist' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
